=======
History
=======

1.2.0 (2019-01-12)
------------------

* Added possibility to convert exceptions by using context manager.

1.1.0 (2018-12-18)
------------------

* Added support for Python 3.5.

1.0.1 (2018-12-12)
------------------

* Updated and improved documentation.

1.0.0 (2018-12-10)
------------------

* First release on PyPI with basic functionality.
